column5: too bad no trolling motors on sale only thing that interests me are the boat bags and reel covers..
My Father refuses to shop there ....

Best thing there I see for guys wanting to start out is the Pete Maina Muskie Combo for $159.88 ($90off)  I've got a stop in there after my daughters grad next Thursday morning.... for some little stuff before headin North. Like a Gortex rain suit.
You're going to need the 150mph one Wayne
Hey Kevin,   What trolling motor are ya lookin for ???  May have one forsale  !!!!!   Brand new in the box too !!!!!  Tiz
Already placed my order for two XPS inflatable PFD ($30 off each)  and a bug suit.  I understand I may need one in a few weeks.  (He He)

You also gots a full roof Wayne my guess would be you will where it in your tinny boat .Maybe just wear it to load the boat when you get out on those rainy days.November fishing will never be the same.  Mike
